full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA DANG GUR MGON LCAM DRAL RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD BZHUGS SO, ,
